item.title: More Productivity With Taskwarrior
item.description: Introduction to Taskwarrior I’ve actually been trying to use taskwarrior for my primary task managemnt tool about it for months without any progress. But today is the day. I am aware of the taskwarrior power when you configure optimal way for your requirements. I don’t explain why you have to choose taskwarrior in this post. If you are wondering how it is awesome, you can visit the official site for great explanation.
